    • actionIsAvailable

      public boolean actionIsAvailable(int cost, int weapon)
      Checks if an action is available, given its cost and the weapon's stock, if applicable.
      Parameters:
      cost - Action cost.
      weapon - Index of the weapon in the factory's static inventory, or -1 if no weapon is involved in the action.
      Returns:
      the test result.
